text: Pachydermia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Peltospiridae. ==Species== Species within the genus Pachydermia include: * Pachydermia laevis Warén & Bouchet, 1989 * Pachydermia sculpta Warén & Bouchet, 1993 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neomphalidae
title: Pachydermia (gastropod)
